sourcesContent:
import React, { useState } from 'react'; import AddStaff from '../../Modal/Staff/addStaff' class StaffComponent extends React.Component { constructor(props) { super(props); this.state = { counters: "this is thanh", name: "thanh", students: this.props.results } } renderTableData() { return this.state.students.map((staff, index) => { const { MANHANVIEN, HOTEN, BIDANH, NGAYSINH, GIOITINH, VANHOA, NGOAINGU, SOTRUONG, CHUYENMON, TRINHDO, NGAYLUUHS, LYDOLUUHS, TRANGTHAI, DANTOC, TONGIAO, SOBHXH, NOI_DKKCB, NHANVIEN_ID, ngaynhap, nguoinhap, ngaysua, nguoisua, SOCMND, NGAYCAP, NOICAP, DIDONG, DIENTHOAIBAN, DIACHIEMAIL, MASOTHUE, Diachi, Quequan, Website, bangcapkhac, chungchikhac, uudiem, khuyetdiem, diachilienhe, kinhnghiem } = staff; return ( {MANHANVIEN} {HOTEN} {BIDANH} {NGAYSINH} {GIOITINH} {VANHOA} {NGOAINGU} {SOTRUONG} {CHUYENMON} {TRINHDO} {NGAYLUUHS} {LYDOLUUHS} {TRANGTHAI} {DANTOC} {TONGIAO} {SOBHXH} {NOI_DKKCB} {NHANVIEN_ID} {ngaynhap} {nguoinhap} {ngaysua} {nguoisua} {SOCMND} {NGAYCAP} {NOICAP} {DIDONG} {DIENTHOAIBAN} {DIACHIEMAIL} {MASOTHUE} {Diachi} {Quequan} {Website} {bangcapkhac} {chungchikhac} {uudiem} {khuyetdiem} {diachilienhe} {kinhnghiem} ) }) } renderTableHeader() { const header = Object.keys(this.state.students[1]) const newheader = header.unshift('tools') return header.map((key, index) => {key.toUpperCase()} ) } render() { return ( <>
{this.props.header}
  1.  Home 
  2. Students 
  3. {this.props.header}
  • List View
  • Grid View
{this.props.header}
Tools
  • Print
  • Save as PDF
  • Export to Excel
{this.renderTableHeader()} {this.renderTableData()}
) } } export default StaffComponent;
